LanguageData.SrNeedTouchCat.label: Cat addiction
LanguageData.SrNeedTouchCat.description: Due to the addiction of touching cats, the character has a desire to touch cats regularly.
LanguageData.SrNeedTouchRabbit.label: Rabbit addiction
LanguageData.SrNeedTouchRabbit.description: Due to the addiction of touching rabbits, the character has a desire to touch rabbits regularly.
